Text:
If you like this great Howard Hawks film, try John Carpenter's 1982 remake, The Thing:
http://thepiratebay.org/tor/3565784/The_Thing_[1982]
all we need now is someone to seed (sits patiently)
Anyone found english subs that sync the full movie?

OMG, DUDE, THANX, BEEN LOOKING FOR THIS 4E4, ORIG WAS A JOHN CAMPBELL STORY IN ANALOG MAGAZINE! I BELIEVE JAMES ARNESS IS THE MONSTER-THING NEAR THE END. PLOT MAKES A BIT MORE SENSE IN THIS FIRST FLIC, CLOSER TO THE WRITTEN STORY. ANYONE KNOW HOW TO FIND THAT? AGAIN, THANKSALOT!
thank you uploader! you certainly have good tastes
Thank you very much! My dad took me to see this when I was little. He often talks about it and will love to see it again! :-)

Excellent thanks!! 

If anybody is looking for the Audio Book of the original novella I just put it up over here:

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6399250/Who_Goes_There_-_John_W_Campbell_[Unabridged_Novella]

R.I.P. The Thing a.k.a. James Arness "Died:
June 3, 2011 (age 88) in Los Angeles, California, USA"
Been wanting to see this just to see it, but the Carpenter version is so much closer to the original story.
